summary: Comprehensive testing of embeddable booking widget system completed. Both backend APIs and frontend components are working correctly with full end-to-end booking flow functional.

flaky_endpoints.impact: Expected behavior - demo business registration handled gracefully
flaky_endpoints.note: This is intentional behavior, system properly falls back to login

passed_tests: Demo page loads successfully with booking widget
Date selection with calendar works (13 available dates found)
Time slot selection displays available slots (16 slots found)
Admin login page loads and functions
Admin login with demo credentials works
Admin dashboard shows bookings (2 bookings displayed)
Admin services page - add service functionality works
Admin services page - service management interface
Admin availability page loads with weekly schedule
Backend API: POST /api/admin/register (200 OK for new business)
End-to-end booking flow: Service → Date → Time → Details → Confirmation
Email functionality properly mocked (no API key configured)
Business ID display and copy functionality
